Package org.adoxx.dobot_magician.service

Class DobotMagicianOperation

java.lang.Object
org.adoxx.dobot_magician.service.DobotMagicianOperation
@Path("/operation")
public class DobotMagicianOperation
extends java.lang.Object
The general operations resource is accessed with /operation. This class provides various general operations like moving, turning or getting a position.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    DobotMagicianOperation()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    DobotCoordinates getPosition()
    The operation is for getting the actual coordinates, where the robotic arm is located at the moment.
    DobotResponse moveToHomePosition()
    The operation moves the arm to home position.
    DobotResponse moveToPosition​(int x, int y, int z)
    The operation moves the arm to the position in a 3 dimensional space.
    DobotResponse turnOffSuctionCup()
    The operation turns off the suction cup.
    DobotResponse turnOnSuctionCup()
    The operation turns on the suction cup.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • DobotMagicianOperation

      public DobotMagicianOperation()

  • Method Details

    • moveToPosition

      @POST @Produces("application/json") @Path("moveToPosition") public DobotResponse moveToPosition​(@QueryParam("x") int x, @QueryParam("y") int y, @QueryParam("z") int z)
      The operation moves the arm to the position in a 3 dimensional space. x-value: moves the arm forward or backward y-value: moves the arm left or right z-value: moves the arm up or down.
      Parameters:
      x - as integer
      y - as intger
      z - as integer
      Returns:
      DobotResponse

    • moveToHomePosition

      @POST @Produces("application/json") @Path("moveToHomePosition") public DobotResponse moveToHomePosition()
      The operation moves the arm to home position. This means that all coordinates are zero at this point. x: 0 y: 0 z: 0
      Returns:
      DobotResponse

    • turnOnSuctionCup

      @POST @Produces("application/json") @Path("turnOnSuctionCup") public DobotResponse turnOnSuctionCup()
      The operation turns on the suction cup. If the arm is placed over an element it is possible to pick up things (coffee cups, paper, ...).
      Returns:
      DobotResponse

    • turnOffSuctionCup

      @POST @Produces("application/json") @Path("turnOffSuctionCup") public DobotResponse turnOffSuctionCup()
      The operation turns off the suction cup. In order to let go of the picked up element, the suction mode can be turned off. If the arm is placed only a little bit above the floor it is lain down, otherwise the element falls down.
      Returns:
      DobotResponse

    • getPosition

      @POST @Produces("application/json") @Path("getPosition") public DobotCoordinates getPosition()
      The operation is for getting the actual coordinates, where the robotic arm is located at the moment.
      Returns:
      DobotResponse
